description: Convert correlated subquery to separate CTE with GROUP BY, then JOIN
When query uses multiple date_dim aliases with different filters (d1, d2, d3), create separate CTEs for each date range and pre-join with fact tables
Convert INTERSECT subquery pattern to multiple EXISTS clauses for better join planning
Extract shared dimension filters (date, item, promotion) into CTEs when multiple channel CTEs (store/catalog/web) apply identical filters independently
